name: MovieMania
0:
”Alexa, open movie feed”
”Alexa launch movie feed”
”Alexa ask movie feed to give me a fact”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: movie feed
des: For the geeky, for the nerdy, for the true cinema believers, this one’s for you. A mass of quite interesting factoids abut your favourite flicks that you can pass off in pubs up and down the land to either the choruses of cheers, hails of boos or the polite nod. The number of facts? Why, it’s a third of Frank Miller’s 300, a dozen mph short of the speed needed for DeLorean time travel and 8.3 times the number of Angry Men.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
